Open for Lunch @ 11a.m., Dinner starts at 4p.m., Sunday Brunch: 10a.m. - 2pm
Welcome to the Contact Us Section of the Riverside Café Website
We appreciate our customers!
Thank you for your interest with us.
We are currently seating walk-in guests only.
To ensure each of our guests are accommodated as quickly as possible, we have decided to no longer hold reservations for tables.
You may call
772.234.5550
or send us an e-mail
info@riversidecafe.com
, but please understand we cannot hold tables for guests if there is a line out the door.  We are until further notice a first-come-first-serve restaurant.  Thank you for your understanding and we will see you soon at the Riverside Café.
Thank you for visiting the contact us section of the Riverside Café Website. We look forward to seeing you and serving you great food!
David and Ellen Lane
Proprieters
The Riverside Café
Print the Riverside Cafe Menu
Employment with the Riverside Cafe:
Individuals seeking employemnt with the Riverside Cafe may call
772.234.5550
or send us an email
info@riversidecafe.com
and ask if we are hiring. Thank you and have a great day!.
